name: Aquaria!
description:
Aquaria! is a html5 game created with a new tool: Superpowers from Sparklinlabs.
The goal is to touch and slide his finger over on aquatic animals of the same species scrolling on the screen. Additionally time is running out, but if a combo of more than two animals made, one second then multiplied by the number of animals is added extra time.

Who am I?

I'm an independent developer, Wahid Garci A.K.A. ShadowTzu, who likes to making games and many other things in 2d/3d.

Where am I?
